pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 20, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the swearing-in ceremony of members of the 29th Canadian Ministry. An official photo of the Governor General with the Canadian Ministry will follow.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage of the ceremony and official photo
  • Media should arrive at the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 12:00 p.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists who are not members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery should contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca to obtain temporary accreditation.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
